segments.text: Don't you think it's nice out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that it's going to rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope that it does rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The sky looks so clean after it rains . I love it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . Rain does make it smell cleaner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love most how it is at night after it rains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can see the stars so much more clearly after it rains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would love for it to rain today .
segments.speaker: S1
